$interpreted: Tica: TADA~~Tica's here!!! Headmaster, whatta you need?
Barbara: Miss Chevalier, if you could be more quiet next time when you open the door, I'd really appreciate it.
Tica: I'll note that~
Barbara: ...I've asked you to come here because there's an important guest coming today. We need a student to help her out and show her around.
Tica: Eh!? But it's summer vaca. K? Most of the kids have gone home. Not many students are on campus~
Barbara: I'm quite aware of this fact. No need to remind me.
Barbara: ——So please, take care of our guest for me.
Tica: Me!?
Tica: But Tica is wayyy too confident. I'm always getting in trouble!
Barbara: You are NOT to cause trouble!
Barbara: If it were a choice, I wouldn't choose you! So do it, and do it well!
Tica: ...Okay...
Barbara: She is the Imperial Empress of the Moon Jelly Court, from the Jellyfish Tribe. Her name is Li Hwa Choe, a medical authority from the East Alliance.
Barbara: She visits the Rune Academy every few years for an academic exchange.
Tica: Oh yeah, I saw that on the application, but I thought Beasts couldn't use Runes?
Barbara: Trust me, I'm as confused as you are.
Barbara: But seeing as she maintains such a powerful position and is widely renowned in the East Alliance, the Academy cannot refuse her...
Barbara: In any case, this is your responsibility. We'll just say it's to make up for stealing the Owl Egg.
Tica: Headmaster, how'd you know!?
Barbara: Nothing gets past me at this school.
Barbara: Remember, if you want to remain at this Academy, you must do what I tell you without a single mistake. Not a single mistake.
Tica: I am sooo perfect for treating guests. Let me handle it!! Beep boop bop~ Customer Service Mode: Initiating... hehe. Let's go!
Tica: Oh yeah, I forgot to ask. What's the esteemed guest look like?
Barbara: She's a JELLYFISH. There's no way you'll miss her. As for her age...she's probably over two hundred years old.
Tica: Geez, that old!?
Tica: Got it. Customer Service Mode: Rebooting... Let's gooo!
Barbara: Close the door－－
Barbara: ...Gently.
Li Hwa: The scale of the Academy is increasing~
Tica: Found her, the jellyfish...Wah! She looks so young!
Tica: Are you Miss Choe!?
Li Hwa: It's been so long since I last visited. I'm curious to see what amazing developments the Academy has made since then.
Tica: Miss Choe, I'm responsible for receiving...
Li Hwa: ...*sigh*...didn't think that Charle would leave his position~ I wonder how learned the new Headmaster is?
Tica: Miss Choe, I'm...
Li Hwa: Aigh...is this a new species of flower? The Soul Energy in Whistlewood Valley is as plentiful as ever~
Tica: Miss Choe, no no no...umm...Dr. Choe?
Tica: Me Lady Choe? Professor Choe? ...Mrs. Choe? The great and powerful...
Li Hwa: Just cannot wait for this academic exchange~
Tica: ...Li Hwa?
Li Hwa: Is someone calling me?
Li Hwa: Ah, could you be Barbara?
Tica: Miss Choe...I mean Li Hwa, hello. My name's Tica Chevalier. Headmaster Balzac is busy at the moment so I'm responsible for seeing to you.
Tica: Whatever you wanna see, just let me know~
Li Hwa: Excellent, excellent.
Li Hwa: Well then~let's begin!
Li Hwa: Yes~The Academy's students are more outstanding than ever.
Tica: Eh? A test, ey? Shouldn't I have been notified ahead of time?
Li Hwa: That's right~
Li Hwa: Being able to combine both Applied and Life Magic, you must be very gifted.
Tica: Hey now~Both of the headmasters said I'm an outstanding talent~
Tica: Recently, I've been studying how to listen in on other's dreams, then amplify them so everybody can hear.
Tica: That'd be quite a prank, though I haven't succeeded yet——
Tica: L-L-L-L-Li Hwa? What's the matter?
Li Hwa: Ooooooooh! That sounds...SO fun!!!!!!!! Com' on, show me, show me!!
Tica: Oooooooh! You're interested?
Tica: Cool beans! Let's go!!
Li Hwa: So, you said you're in the school of Applied Magic, aren't you worried about not learning Life Magic?
Li Hwa: Could it be that the Academy no longer makes such a division?
Tica: No, it does. But that's alright!
Tica: I mean, everybody's here to study anyway. Headmaster Ceres always said that what's important is that you want to learn~
Li Hwa: How nostalgic, this is my...
Tica: Eeeeeeehhhh!? Is that——
Tica: Professor Clovis holding Elio!?
Aosta: ...At last, the final step.
Tica: It's really Elio! Professor Clovis, what are you doing!?
Li Hwa: Watch out!

Model.Text: TADA~~Tica's here!!! Headmaster, whatta you need?
Miss Chevalier, if you could be more quiet next time when you open the door, I'd really appreciate it.
I'll note that~
...I've asked you to come here because there's an important guest coming today. We need a student to help her out and show her around.
Eh!? But it's summer vaca. K? Most of the kids have gone home. Not many students are on campus~
I'm quite aware of this fact. No need to remind me.
——So please, take care of our guest for me.
Me!?
But Tica is wayyy too confident. I'm always getting in trouble!
You are NOT to cause trouble!
If it were a choice, I wouldn't choose you! So do it, and do it well!
...Okay...
She is the Imperial Empress of the Moon Jelly Court, from the Jellyfish Tribe. Her name is Li Hwa Choe, a medical authority from the East Alliance.
She visits the Rune Academy every few years for an academic exchange.
Oh yeah, I saw that on the application, but I thought Beasts couldn't use Runes?
Trust me, I'm as confused as you are.
But seeing as she maintains such a powerful position and is widely renowned in the East Alliance, the Academy cannot refuse her...
In any case, this is your responsibility. We'll just say it's to make up for stealing the Owl Egg.
Headmaster, how'd you know!?
Nothing gets past me at this school.
Remember, if you want to remain at this Academy, you must do what I tell you without a single mistake. Not a single mistake.
I am sooo perfect for treating guests. Let me handle it!! Beep boop bop~ Customer Service Mode: Initiating... hehe. Let's go!
Oh yeah, I forgot to ask. What's the esteemed guest look like?
She's a JELLYFISH. There's no way you'll miss her. As for her age...she's probably over two hundred years old.
Geez, that old!?
Got it. Customer Service Mode: Rebooting... Let's gooo!
Close the door－－
...Gently.
The scale of the Academy is increasing~
Found her, the jellyfish...Wah! She looks so young!
Are you Miss Choe!?
It's been so long since I last visited. I'm curious to see what amazing developments the Academy has made since then.
Miss Choe, I'm responsible for receiving...
...*sigh*...didn't think that Charle would leave his position~ I wonder how learned the new Headmaster is?
Miss Choe, I'm...
Aigh...is this a new species of flower? The Soul Energy in Whistlewood Valley is as plentiful as ever~
Miss Choe, no no no...umm...Dr. Choe?
Me Lady Choe? Professor Choe? ...Mrs. Choe? The great and powerful...
Just cannot wait for this academic exchange~
...Li Hwa?
Is someone calling me?
Ah, could you be Barbara?
Miss Choe...I mean Li Hwa, hello. My name's Tica Chevalier. Headmaster Balzac is busy at the moment so I'm responsible for seeing to you.
Whatever you wanna see, just let me know~
Excellent, excellent.
Well then~let's begin!
Yes~The Academy's students are more outstanding than ever.
Eh? A test, ey? Shouldn't I have been notified ahead of time?
That's right~
Being able to combine both Applied and Life Magic, you must be very gifted.
Hey now~Both of the headmasters said I'm an outstanding talent~
Recently, I've been studying how to listen in on other's dreams, then amplify them so everybody can hear.
That'd be quite a prank, though I haven't succeeded yet——
L-L-L-L-Li Hwa? What's the matter?
Ooooooooh! That sounds...SO fun!!!!!!!! Com' on, show me, show me!!
Oooooooh! You're interested?
Cool beans! Let's go!!
So, you said you're in the school of Applied Magic, aren't you worried about not learning Life Magic?
Could it be that the Academy no longer makes such a division?
No, it does. But that's alright!
I mean, everybody's here to study anyway. Headmaster Ceres always said that what's important is that you want to learn~
How nostalgic, this is my...
Eeeeeeehhhh!? Is that——
Professor Clovis holding Elio!?
...At last, the final step.
It's really Elio! Professor Clovis, what are you doing!?
Watch out!
